completed_steps.summary: Existing docs: README.md found. No additional context provided.
Comprehensive analysis complete: API (Tauri Commands), Data Models (Rust Structs), UI Components (React + Radix), and State (Zustand) documented.

findings.project_classification: BmadDash (tauri-app) is a desktop application (Tauri v2) with a React frontend and Rust backend.

technology_stack.frontend: React 19, Vite, Tailwind CSS 4, Radix UI, TanStack Router, Zustand, Lucide React
technology_stack.backend: Rust (Tauri v2), Serde, Walkdir, Chrono, Notify, Parking_lot
technology_stack.architecture: Desktop (Tauri) with split Frontend/Backend communication via IPC commands
technology_stack.api_contracts: 9 Tauri commands for project scanning, parsing, document management, and file watching.
technology_stack.data_models: BmadProject, Epic, Story, Task, AcceptanceCriteria, BmadDocument, SprintStatus.
technology_stack.ui_components: React components for Dashboard, Kanban, Documents, Editor, Timeline, and Progress tracking. Uses Radix UI for structural components.
technology_stack.state_management: Zustand store (projectStore.ts) with persistence, handling projects, view state, and filters.
